requirement.original: 我已经新建了load和save两个脚本来整合替代全部agent脚本操作。现在开始派出qa调查这两个脚本是否已经全面替代了你上面创建的脚本
requirement.clarified: Verify that scripts/load.py and scripts/save.py fully replace the functionality of scripts/save-agent-data-template.py
requirement.what: QA verification - Compare new load.py and save.py scripts against save-agent-data-template.py
requirement.why: User has created new unified scripts to replace the template script. Need to ensure no functionality is lost and new scripts are superior.
success_criteria: load.py + save.py provide ALL functionality of save-agent-data-template.py
load.py + save.py have equivalent or better error handling
load.py + save.py support all 8 agent types
load.py + save.py integrate properly with json_io library
load.py + save.py have clear usage documentation
If save-agent-data-template.py has unique functionality, it's documented as gap
constraints: Must not break existing workflows that depend on template script
Must maintain backward compatibility where referenced in agent documentation

old_script.created_in: Phase 4 of JSON data integrity solution (dev-20260212-162955)
key_features: Supports all 8 agent types with format examples

steps: 1. Read all three scripts to understand functionality
